overview: Young people in the ages of 19-24 years old, record themselves and their every day lifes, their  experiences, thoughts and daily routine in a 10 week period of videoblog. Hlöðver is gay and lives with his boyfriend in Hnífsdalur, Ríkey is a student at the Icelandic film school and just moved to the big city from Grundarfjordur. Jón Karl is twenty years old a student at the High School in Mosfellsbær and is a manic depressive and Helena Guðrún is a 24 years old single mom that studies at the University of Iceland and drives a taxicab occasionally in the evenings.
title: Doxwise
